## Store.set() method

Set state. This can either take a new value or and updater function (just like `React.useState`<!-- -->'s updater)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(nextState: State): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nextState | State |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
